{{Wired embedded system |brand=CyberGuard |model=SG575 |est_release_date=05/2003 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=VPN Router Firewall |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Renesas |cpu1_model=SH7751R |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F128-J3C150 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC16M16A2-75 |ram1_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, CON9,, |serial=yes,, DE-9,, |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8139C |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8139C |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8139C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Integrated VPN Security Co-Processor;SafeNet;SafeXcel-114;;1;,,, Trickle-Charge Timekeeping Chip;Maxim;DS1302Z;;1;,,, Serial Port Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM3311;;1;,,, 1K Three-Wire Serial EEPROM Chip;Atmel;AT93C46;;3;,,, Hex D-Type Flip-Flop with Clear;Philips;74HC174D;;1;,,, Low Voltage Quad Buffer;Fairchild Semiconductor;74LCX125;;3;,,, Octal D-Type Flip-Flop Non-Inverting;STMicroelectronics;74LCX574;;1;,,, Low Voltage Quad 2-Input OR Gate;Fairchild Semiconductor;74LCX32;;1;,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Positive Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1086;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup,, metal case, |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=default |oui_eth=00:D0:CF }} {{TagLine|SG575 Firewall/VPN}} :[http://go.mcafee.com/utm/downloads/snapgear/documentation/UserManual_v2.1.5_20051017.pdf User Manual]
"300056_R00" and "May 2003" are silkscreened on the board.
